DOC.criteria: Males female ( 1875 year ) Must follow restrictive diet Diagnosis primary hypercholesterolemia combine dyslipidemia Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia familial hypoalphalipoproteinemia ; Conditions may cause secondary dyslipidemia . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( hemoglobin A1c [ HbA1c ] > 8 % ) Abnormal serum creatine kinase ( CK ) prespecified level Abnormal pancreatic , liver renal function Significant heart disease
